sentences.sContent: Thornbury has announced a takeover bid of a regional TV company.
sentences.sCn: 索恩伯里已经宣布将出价收购一家地方电视公司。

sentences.sContent: He prevented a hostile takeover (= when the takeover is not wanted by the company being bought ) of the company.
sentences.sCn: 他阻止了对公司的恶意收购。

phrases.pCn: 收购行动；收购竞争；购并出价

trans.tranOther: when one company takes control of another by buying more than half its  shares
